nodes.description: 巴基斯坦Shah Hasan Khan村举行排球比赛期间发生自杀式爆炸
nodes.support_text: a suicide bomb attack at a volleyball match in north-west Pakistan

nodes.description: 爆炸造成88人死亡37人受伤，是两月以来最致命袭击
nodes.support_text: at least 88 people have been killed and dozens more wounded

nodes.description: 南瓦济斯坦部落区自10月以来因军事行动已致500余人死亡
nodes.support_text: since the army launched an offensive... have killed more than 500 people since October

nodes.description: 当地村民组成民兵成功驱逐极端分子
nodes.support_text: Locals set up a militia and expelled the militants from this area

nodes.description: 爆炸袭击者驾车进入比赛场地并引爆炸弹
nodes.support_text: the bomber drove onto the field during the volleyball contest

nodes.description: 爆炸导致20余间房屋倒塌，约10人被困废墟
nodes.support_text: More than 20 nearby houses collapsed... some 10 or so people might have been trapped

nodes.description: 警方承认此前宣称已完全控制该地区但实际存在安全漏洞
nodes.support_text: Police and the army had previously claimed to have completely secured the region

nodes.description: 最新血腥事件震动巴基斯坦
nodes.support_text: 最新血腥事件震动巴基斯坦

nodes.description: 军事行动使武装分子分散
nodes.support_text: 军事行动使武装分子分散

nodes.description: 军事行动引发报复性袭击
nodes.support_text: 军事行动引发报复性袭击

nodes.description: 大量观众正在观看巴基斯坦Shah Hasan Khan村的排球比赛
nodes.support_text: a lot of people were watching the volleyball match

edges.support_text: at least 88 people have been killed
since the army launched an offensive... have killed more than 500 people since October
This attack seems to be reaction to their expulsion
the bomber drove onto the field during the volleyball contest
Police and the army had previously claimed to have completely secured the region
观众观看比赛与爆炸袭击在时间上重叠（原句未明确时序需补充）
